channel.title: Error Help
channel.description:
Hi, im running my client and my accounts is at home, and everytime i teleport to home and when im there my client crases and the error is
Error: Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.RuntimeException: error unzipping at Class42_Sub1.method561(Class42_Sub1.java:482) at client.method57(client.java:2536) at client.method7(client.java:1898) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:115) at client.run(client.java:4299) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
So please someone can u help me pls - Infexis

item.title: Error Help
item.dc:creator: @Realm_of_Dark Realm of Dark
item.description:
@Realm_of_Dark wrote:

what kind of client is it (317, 508)…?

possibly, the client can’t unzip the correct animation for teleporting (if you manually added it or something). therefore, when you tried to teleport, the animation wouldn’t load and it would crash because of that…?

if you could, reply back with your client type (ex: 317) and i’ll see if i can figure out the error.

Read full topic

item.title: Error Help
item.dc:creator: @P0own3ed P0own3ed
item.description:
@P0own3ed wrote:

So please someone can u help me pls - Infexis
